price: እርሱ ያ ሌሊትን በውስጡ ልታርፉበት (ጨለማ)፤ ቀንንም (ልትሠሩበት) ብርሃን ያደረገላችሁ ነው፡፡ በዚህ ውስጥ ለሚሰሙ ሕዝቦች በእርግጥ ታምራቶች አሉ፡፡
arabic: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ لِتَسۡكُنُواْ فِيهِ وَٱلنَّهَارَ مُبۡصِرًاۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-layla litaskunū fīhi wal-nahāra mub'ṣiran inna fī dhālika laāyātin liqawmin yasmaʿūna
